channel.title: [317] My passwords aren't saving,
channel.description:
Hey, I've almost finished my server Then i found this glitch/bug/error. My password saving isn't working. So this means.
I login on: Username: Example Password: 12345
That account creates and save's, then i can login that account with.
Username: Example Password: Anything
Any suggestions on how to fix this?
